buyPolicy(PolicyBean, UserBean, QuoteBean) - Method in interface com.root.dao.PolicyDAO
 
buyPolicy(PolicyBean, UserBean, QuoteBean) - Method in class com.root.dao.PolicyDAOImpl
This is a method for Buy policy Here we use database connectivity for inserting details
buyPolicy(PolicyBean, UserBean, QuoteBean) - Method in interface com.root.service.PolicyService
 
buyPolicy(PolicyBean, UserBean, QuoteBean) - Method in class com.root.service.PolicyServiceImpl
This method will be invoked from Controller to generate the policy schemes It will call buyPolicy method from dao layer internally to store calculated policy details in database
